Measuring and estimating funding to data and statistics Why this methodology note?

Measuring and estimating funding to data and statistics Version 2 (updated on November 2022) Why this methodology note? PARIS21 produces the Partner Report on Support to Statistics (PRESS) annually to report on trends in support to statistics. The methodology is applied retrospectively for all previous years to ensure comparability over time. This document presents the methodology used in PRESS 2022.
